frontmatter.title: Building an FPV Racing Drone from Scratch: My Path to High-Speed Flying
frontmatter.summary: I crafted an FPV (First Person View) racing drone from the ground up, selecting and assembling each part carefully. This hands-on experience was thrilling and helped me understand the challenges of creating a fast and agile drone.
